## remoteConfig.RemoteConfig.createTemplateFromJSON() method

Creates and returns a new Remote Config template from a JSON string.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createTemplateFromJSON(json: string): RemoteConfigTemplate;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  json | string | The JSON string to populate a Remote Config template. A new template instance. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[RemoteConfigTemplate](./firebase-admin.remoteconfig.remoteconfigtemplate.md)
